channel.title: Link Layer Discovery Protocol on Cumulus Networks Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Link Layer Discovery Protocol on Cumulus Networks Documentation

item.title: Voice VLAN
item.description: In Cumulus Linux, a voice VLAN is a VLAN dedicated to voice traffic on a switch. However, the term can mean different things to different vendors. Cumulus Linux Voice VLAN Example You can configure the topology above using the following NCLU commands: cumulus@switch:~$ net add bridge bridge ports swp1-3 cumulus@switch:~$ net add bridge bridge vids 1-1000 cumulus@switch:~$ net add bridge bridge pvid 1 cumulus@switch:~$ net add interface swp1-2 bridge vids 200 cumulus@switch:~$ net add interface swp1-2 bridge pvid 100 cumulus@switch:~$ net add interface swp1-2 stp bpduguard cumulus@switch:~$ net add interface swp1-2 stp portadminedge cumulus@switch:~$ net pending cumulus@switch:~$ net commit These commands create the following configuration snippet in the /etc/network/interfaces file:
